metadata.title: YSSJGOOD Pyramid Crystal, Healing Meditation,Metaphysical Stone Statue, Natural gem, Pyramid Carving, Metaphysical Stone, Balance Aura, Natural Crystal Statue (Rose Quartz)
features: 【The Power and Energy Source of Nature】Through the apex of pyramid crystal to enlarge and balance energy, believe that everything in pyramid electromagnetic field will move towards harmony.

【Natural tranquilizers】 Relieve stress and tension, balance mood swings, and eliminate anger, fear and anxiety. It has a significant effect on cleansing, healing, purifying, and enhancing personal energy level/frequency and positive energy aura.
【Application】Suitable for home and office decoration, collection, gift and study. It can be used for home decoration, even therapy, chakra, meditation gem.

【Size】 The width is about 1.2x1.2 inches (3x3 cm). Please pay attention to the changes in size, shape, color and crystal transparency.Each product is different and unique, and the crystal pictures are for display purposes only.
Rose quartz is called a love stone which opens the heart chakra to let love flow. Bring the energies of love, tranquility and harmony.
description: A great gift for any occasion, each sample is unique due to the materials used, and is similar in shape and orientation to the ones shown in the picture.   Suitable for home and office decoration, collection, gift, study.   Pyramid shapes are supernatural sources of power and energy, amplifying and balancing energy through their vertices.  Believe that everything in the pyramid's electromagnetic field will harmonize.  Can be used for home decor or even healing, chakras, meditation gems.
If you have any quality problems, please feel free to contact us. We can provide you with new products or a full refund.
